channel.title: Adding npc drops? READ and REPLY
channel.description:
How do i code this? I know how to add drops but this way is different
<list> <npcDrop> <npc>2</npc> <drops> <drop> <chance>100</chance> <items> <item> <id>14484</id> <amount>1</amount> </item> </items> </drop> </drops> </npcDrop> </list>
I want to add chickens to drop some bones meat and feathers, anyone know how I can add this to this type of format?

item.title: Adding npc drops? READ and REPLY
item.dc:creator: @Darthax Darthax
item.description:
@Darthax wrote:

2 item id 100 % off drop 14484 npc id 1 how many it will drop

im not sure if thats what you are looking for but if u wonted to add more then one drop to it maby like this

2 100 100 14484 1 14484 1

or just repeat the first one and change the id’s sorry hav not really looked into 562 servers yet

Read full topic
item.source: Adding npc drops? READ and REPLY

item.title: Adding npc drops? READ and REPLY
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“blakeman8192, post:4, topic:329942”]ok so this is in XML.
read up on how the XML syntax works (use this awesome website to find what you need) and then apply what you learned to add drops for the npc you want.
remember to keep it consistent with the other npc drops[/quote]

i lol’d

oh and wanbli, didn’t you close your server or something?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding npc drops? READ and REPLY

item.title: Adding npc drops? READ and REPLY
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok so this is in XML.
read up on how the XML syntax works (use this awesome website to find what you need) and then apply what you learned to add drops for the npc you want.
remember to keep it consistent with the other npc drops

item.description:
@towriss wrote:

go into npcdrops.gfx and search chickens and get the ID for bones etc. change id’s and compile.
